title: Opinion: A Superdomestique Will Usurp One of the ‘Big 4’ at the Tour de France
content:
#GCKuss redux? Superstar teammates like Kuss, Yates, Jorgenson stand better chances at Le Tour than some of the beat-up 'Big 4'.

Read the full article at Opinion: A Superdomestique Will Usurp One of the ‘Big 4’ at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
